hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT idComment FROM (SELECT idcomment,IFNULL(idCommentParent,idcomment) as idParent FROM tcomment LEFT JOIN tcommentresponse ON idcomment=idcommentresponse WHERE idlesson=? ORDER BY idParent,idComment ) as t LIMIT ?,51;

SELECT tc.idComment,idUser,COALESCE(tcbn.date, dateEdit, tc.date) as 'date', IFNULL(idcommentparent,0) AS idParentComment, COALESCE(reason,body) as body, IFNULL(tce.idcomment,0)>0 as edited, IFNULL(tcbn.idcomment,0)>0 as banned FROM tcomment tc JOIN tcommentbody tcb ON tcb.idcomment=tc.idcomment LEFT JOIN tcommentresponse tcr ON tc.idcomment=idcommentresponse LEFT JOIN tcommentedit tce ON tc.idcomment=tce.idcomment LEFT JOIN tcommentbanned tcbn ON tc.idcomment=tcbn.idcomment WHERE tc.idComment = ?;
